poolAlerts.alertText: DEAR SWIMMERS BALBOA POOL WILL BE CLOSED FOR MAINTENANCE JAN 6 TO JAN 19. THE POOL WILL REOPEN ON JAN 20.
Dear swimmers with small children. Please note that the wading pool has a broken heater and is currently closed.
North Beach Sauna is currently closed. Our team is working on the repairs, and we will update you soon.
